sys_script_include.name: GetIncidentsInstance

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_7dfb00759728ca105e9fb680f053af13
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1174267_now_pr_0.GetIncidentsInstance</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetIncidentsInstance</name><script><![CDATA[var GetIncidentsInstance = Class.create();
GetIncidentsInstance.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	obterIncidentesPorIntegracao: function() {

        var obterIncidentes = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_1174267_now_pr_0.ApiOutraInstancia2', 'GET');

        var Response = obterIncidentes.execute();
        var Body = Response.getBody();
        var Collection = JSON.parse(Body);
        var Result = Collection.result;

        this.gravarIncidentesIntegracao(Result);

    },
	gravarIncidentesIntegracao: function(Result) {

        Result.forEach(function(Incidentes) {

            var gravarIncidente = new GlideRecord('incident');

            gravarIncidente.initialize();

            gravarIncidente.state = Incidentes.state;
            gravarIncidente.impact = Incidentes.impact;
            gravarIncidente.active = Incidentes.active;
            gravarIncidente.priority = Incidentes.priority;
			gravarIncidente.short_description = Incidentes.short_description;
            gravarIncidente.description = Incidentes.description;
            gravarIncidente.category = Incidentes.category;
            gravarIncidente.assigned_to = Incidentes.assigned_to;
            gravarIncidente.caller_id = Incidentes.assigned_id;
            gravarIncidente.u_incident_source = Incidentes.sys_id;
            gravarIncidente.work_notes = "INCIDENTE DE ORIGEM: " + Incidentes.number;
			gravarIncidente.insert();

            gs.info("INCIDENTE GRAVADO " + Incidentes.number);

        });
	},

    type: 'GetIncidentsInstance'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-24 12:21:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>7dfb00759728ca105e9fb680f053af13</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetIncidentsInstance</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Now Pro - Aula 06" source="x_1174267_now_pr_0">c0944f264763311008334d05516d438f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Now Pro - Aula 06">c0944f264763311008334d05516d438f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7dfb00759728ca105e9fb680f053af13</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-24 12:21:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
